channel.title: New Community
channel.description:
Hey guys!
Sorry if my typing is not the greatest i typing this off my iPhone while parked off to the side on the highway.
I am looking to start up a small rsps community, I have already purchased a vps and a website to get it slowly going. I've wanted to do this project for quite some time but I was a lot younger and didn't have the means to get the ball rolling.
What I am looking for is client side and server side developers. I am looking for two server side and one client side to start.
I do not have a decision yet whether I want a pk server or an npc grind, but this can be discussed and chosen based off what everyone thinks. I'd like to build a relationship with the people I am working with.
I will handle the funds of the vps and the website, I just dont have knowledge when it comes to coding and such.
Now the question comes, will I be paying? To start, no I will not be able to pay right off the bat, but when the community launches and we have a player base and some people start to donate I would be more then happy to throw some of the donation money your way as a thank you. I'd also like to keep people who are interested in working long term.
I know everyone may not agree with all my decisions, but I am open to suggestions and I hope we can get something worked out!
Feel free to pm me on the forums, but you can email or skype me at anytime.
Email: tylerss@hotmail.com Skype: firecrandor
Thanks again for reading this post, can't wait to talk!

item.title: New Community
item.dc:creator: @Tylerscs Tylerscs
item.description:
@Tylerscs wrote:

Hey guys!

Sorry if my typing is not the greatest i typing this off my iPhone while parked off to the side on the highway.

I am looking to start up a small rsps community, I have already purchased a vps and a website to get it slowly going. I’ve wanted to do this project for quite some time but I was a lot younger and didn’t have the means to get the ball rolling.

What I am looking for is client side and server side developers. I am looking for two server side and one client side to start.
